title: section 4 of the Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Emergency Measures in the Public
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Emergency Measures in the Public 

Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020 (Section 4) Order 2020.

title: section 4 of the Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020
heading: 2. The emergency period is extended for such period as expires on 20 July

title: section 4 of the Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) Act 2020 (Section 
4) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 224 of 2020) extends the emergency period defined in 
section 3 of Part 2 of the Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Covid-19) 
Act 2020 (No. 2 of 2020) to expire on 20 July 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [224]
